sentences.en: As far as I'm concerned the officials incited the fight.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，是官员们煽动了这场争斗。

sentences.en: Atlantic City is the hot favourite to stage the fight.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋城举行这场拳击比赛是众望所归。

sentences.en: He had had a fight with Smith and bloodied his nose.
sentences.cn: 他和史密斯打了一架，把后者的鼻子打出了血。

sentences.en: He had never been knocked out in a professional fight.
sentences.cn: 在职业拳击赛中，他从未被击倒判败过。

sentences.en: he was fighting a losing battle to stem the tears.
sentences.cn: 他徒劳地想要止住泪水。

sentences.en: He'd put up a real fight to keep you there.
sentences.cn: 他曾努力争取让你留在那儿。

sentences.en: Her son was always getting into fights at school.
sentences.cn: 她儿子老是在学校打架。

sentences.en: I refuse to act that way when my kids fight.
sentences.cn: 我的孩子们打起架来时，我不会那样做。

sentences.en: I thought that we had a lot of fight in us.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们斗志高昂。

sentences.en: I too am committing myself to continue the fight for justice.
sentences.cn: 我本人也保证将继续为正义而战。

sentences.en: I tried to talk myself out of a fight.
sentences.cn: 我费尽口舌想避免一场打架。

sentences.en: I was in a nightclub in Brixton and a fight broke out.
sentences.cn: 当时我在布里克斯顿的一家夜总会里，那里发生了一场斗殴。

sentences.en: Later the Indians fought the Anglo settlers.
sentences.cn: 后来，印第安人跟英国殖民者打起了仗。

sentences.en: Neither country is capable of fighting a long war .
sentences.cn: 两个国家都没有能力打持久战。

sentences.en: She fought her way back into the first team.
sentences.cn: 她奋力拼搏，又回到了第一团队。

sentences.en: She fought him desperately, kicking and biting.
sentences.cn: 她又踢又咬，与他拼命撕打。

sentences.en: The men were fighting for higher wages.
sentences.cn: 那些人在争取加薪。

sentences.en: they fought it out with a tug-of-war.
sentences.cn: 他们通过激烈的竞争来解决问题。

sentences.en: They sparred for a moment, on the brink of a full fight.
sentences.cn: 他们互相推搡了一会儿，眼看就要大打出手了。

sentences.en: United certainly made a fight of it in the second half.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，联队在下半场奋起抵抗了。

sentences.en: We are prepared to fight for every inch of territory.
sentences.cn: 我们时刻准备着为每一寸领土而战。

sentences.en: We'll face a tough fight in the upcoming election.
sentences.cn: 在即将到来的选举中，我们将面临一场恶斗。

sentences.en: We're expected to hustle and fight for what we want.
sentences.cn: 我们应该为得到自己想要的而不择手段，奋力争取。

sentences.en: well-fed people are better able to fight off infectious disease.
sentences.cn: 营养充足的人更能抵抗传染病。

sentences.en: Whatever the outcome, it's going to be one hell of a fight.
sentences.cn: 不管结果如何，这都会是场艰苦的战斗。
